trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> para que seja possível usar o padrão “ouvinte de eventos fraco” para anexar ouvintes ao evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Para ser ouvintes nesse padrão, os objetos de ouvinte devem implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> na classe que é a origem dos eventos.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o manipulador de eventos especificado, que é chamado quando a origem especificada gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado como um ouvinte.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified listener to the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o ouvinte especificado ao evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um novo objeto para conter ouvintes do evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto para conter ouvintes do evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos especificado da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: O ouvinte a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o ouvinte especificado do evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> na origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Para de escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> na origem especificada.
